name: Ambient Maw
description:
We Move.

We Enter.

We Feel.

We Hear.

We Peer Into the Maw.

Ambient Music Punctuated Fractal Space Abstraction Walking Sim.

Fractals will teach you the nature of infinities

Created by Danny Hesz, Game Designer, RMIT. LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/danny-hesz/

Music created by Nicholas Dunkley, Audio Engineer. 

Special thanks to Matej Vanco's Raymarcher asset for fractal wonders. 

 https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/raym...
